contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} '''Tongwell''' is a district and ancient [[hamlet (place)|hamlet]] in the [[civil parishes in England|civil parish]] of [[Great Linford]] in [[Milton Keynes]], [[England]]. Historically, it was in the parish of [[Newport Pagnell]] but today it is separated from Newport Pagnell by the [[M1 motorway]] and has become part of [[Milton Keynes]]. Just a few farms remained before the land was built on. It is now an industrial area. Numerous companies operate from Tongwell such as Dawson Group, [[Mercedes-Benz]] UK and [[Volkswagen]] UK. {{Coord|52.068|-0.730|type:city_region:GB-MIK|display=title}} [[Category:Hamlets in Buckinghamshire]] [[Category:Milton Keynes]] {{Buckinghamshire-geo-stub}}
